name: Ejected Star Prologue (Installer)
description:
Ejected Star is a comedy Sci-fi adventure! Play as Tommy Tektite as he sets off on an adventure across the stars.

Left click to Interact/Pick-up items.

Right click to Examine items.

Inventory at top of screen.

Double click to run!

Follow for more updates at:  https://twitter.com/EjectedStar
